long_description: When you are feeling a bit antsy and need to cure your cabin fever, quickly grab the Haiku Escape shoulder bag with just the basics in tow. Three pockets: 1 external slip-in; 1 internal zippered; and 1 internal rip-and-stick closure. Adjustable 51 in. strap lets you carry the Haiku Escape shoulder bag cross-body with hands free. cyclePET recycled polyethylene is made from 100% post-consumer beverage bottles; this textured fabric is soft yet durable. Nontoxic dyes do not contain carcinogenic materials, heavy metals or formaldehyde.
short_description: When you are feeling a bit antsy and need to cure your cabin fever, quickly grab the Haiku Escape shoulder bag with just the basics in tow.
